metadata.title: CVE-2014-125012 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in FFmpeg 2.0. It has been classified asproblematic. Affected is an unknown function of the filelibavcodec/dxtroy.c. The manipulation leads to integer coercion error. Itis possible to launch the attack remotely. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
